This immedietly alerted me and Twnty that the person contacting him was a scammer and we decided to play along acting dumb. Soon after, Dazed had linked Twnty a link of a person named "Gara" an impersontor of an actual middleman/ trade admin and provided Twnty this link - [url]https://steamcommunity.com/id/GaraOfficialsteamAdmin1/[/url] . I was banned on steamrep over a year ago and I actually understand that. I also made a Ban Appeal back in May 2016 which got rejected because I didn't had all the information I needed to and because of my "story changed too many times", I'm really sorry for that. Then I made a break from CS GO until now, where I came back to play because I got motivated by the Eleague Major and my friends. And now, as I started to play again, I don't want that people look on my SteamRep profile and see:"Oh, this guy is a scammer", because I'm not. This is my story so far: I got this ban for impersonating "Someone" on my old Steam account, I really regret this, because I was doing this out of rage caused by a scammer who scammed me with impersonating "Someone". I know that was so silly and now over a year later I think I can stand above that:"I got scammed because I was too dumb and don't have to seek for payback at all costs". After that my account was listed in a mass report in the FoG-Forum and the ban followed. To be honest I tried to scam two people with but they didn't fall for that. After I calmed down, the next day or so, I decided to make up my mind, create a new Steam-Account and get out of CS GO-Trading but I still wanted to play the game, so I bought it and I'm still playing on that account until now. After a while I bought myself some skins again and wanted to gamble/bet with them. The problem was that Steam created the Mobile-Authentification for website-log in (this "code thing" to log in on CSGL and other 3rd party sites) so I had to make a dicision. I headed back to my old Steam-Account deleted my phone number from there so that I can use it on my new account and set the profile to private (to say I've abandoned it). I knew that I can't get access to this account anymore but that was ok for me because I wanted to leave it behind. After some time again I realised I got banned on my new account also, that was reallly frustrating but I said to myself:"You already lost one account to your silliness, don't do this again!", that worked I just took it how it was. Then I made a break from CS because I lost the motivation and also my rejected appeal was a reason, partly. Now I'm back and I want to start clear, without bans, without any bad reputation. I was as honest as I can be and I hope you understand my situation. Also I want to apologize to "Someone" for impersonating him/her, I really regret this.
